member.name: M:Sandbox.ModAPI.IMyCubeBlock.OnBuildSuccess(System.Int64)
member.summary: Method called when a block has been built (after adding to the grid). This is called right after placing the block and it doesn't matter whether it is fully built (creative mode) or is only construction site. Note that it is not called for blocks which do not create FatBlock at that moment.

member.name: M:Sandbox.ModAPI.Interfaces.IMyStorage.ReadRange(VRage.Common.Voxels.MyStorageDataCache,VRage.Common.Voxels.MyStorageDataTypeFlags,System.Int32,VRageMath.Vector3I,VRageMath.Vector3I)
member.summary: Reads range of content and/or materials from specified LOD. If you want to write data back later, you must read LOD0 as that is the only writable one.

member.name: M:Sandbox.ModAPI.Interfaces.IMyStorage.WriteRange(VRage.Common.Voxels.MyStorageDataCache,VRage.Common.Voxels.MyStorageDataTypeFlags,VRageMath.Vector3I,VRageMath.Vector3I)
member.summary: Writes range of content and/or materials from cache to storage. Note that this can only write to LOD0 (higher LODs must be computed based on that).

member.name: M:Sandbox.Common.ObjectBuilders.MyObjectBuilder_EntityBase.Remap(Sandbox.Common.ObjectBuilders.IMyRemapHelper)
member.summary: Remaps this entity's entityId to a new value. If there are cross-referenced between different entities in this object builder, the remapHelper should be used to rememeber these references and retrieve them.

member.name: F:Sandbox.Common.ObjectBuilders.MyObjectBuilder_SessionSettings.WorldSizeKm
member.summary: Size of the edge of the world area cube. Don't use directly, as it is error-prone (it's km instead of m and edge size instead of half-extent) Rather use MyEntities.WorldHalfExtent()

member.name: F:Sandbox.Common.ObjectBuilders.Definitions.BlueprintItem.Amount
member.summary: Amount of item required or produced. For discrete objects this refers to pieces. For ingots and ore, this refers to volume in m^3.

member.name: F:Sandbox.Definitions.MyDefinitionBase.DisplayNameEnum
member.summary: Enum used for localization of display name. Null for player created definitions.

member.name: F:Sandbox.Definitions.MyDefinitionBase.DescriptionEnum
member.summary: Enum used for localization of description. Null for player created definitions.

member.name: F:Sandbox.Definitions.MyDefinitionBase.DisplayNameString
member.summary: String name used for user created definitions which do not have localization support.

member.name: F:Sandbox.Definitions.MyDefinitionBase.DescriptionString
member.summary: String used for user created description which do not have localization support.

member.name: F:Sandbox.Definitions.MyDefinitionBase.Enabled
member.summary: Definition can be disabled by mod, then it will be removed from definition manager

member.name: F:Sandbox.Definitions.MyDefinitionBase.Public
member.summary: Indicates if definition should be offered in Cube builder

member.name: P:Sandbox.Definitions.MyDefinitionBase.DisplayNameText
member.summary: Use this property when showing name in GUI instead of DisplayName. This takes into account more complex name construction.

member.name: P:Sandbox.Definitions.MyDefinitionBase.DescriptionText
member.summary: Use this property when showing description in GUI, as it takes into account more complex description construction.

member.name: T:Sandbox.Definitions.MyDefinitionId
member.summary: Prefer getting definition ID using object builder used to create the item. If you have automatic rifle, in its Init method create new MyDefinitionId using TypeId and SubtypeName of object builder. Do not write specific values in code, as data comes from XML and if those change, code needs to change as well.

member.name: M:Sandbox.Definitions.MyDefinitionId.GetHashCodeLong
member.summary: Safer hash code. It is unique in more situations than GetHashCode would be, but it may still require full check.

member.name: M:Sandbox.Common.ObjectBuilders.Serializer.MyObjectBuilderSerializer.MemberwiseAssignment(Sandbox.Common.ObjectBuilders.MyObjectBuilder_Base,Sandbox.Common.ObjectBuilders.MyObjectBuilder_Base)
member.summary: Performs shallow copy of data between members of the same name and type from source to target. This method can be slow and inefficient, so use only when needed.

member.name: T:Sandbox.Common.ObjectBuilders.Definitions.MyGlobalEventTypeEnum
member.summary: Defines the event type. Each event type has its assigned handler method and data class type. Multiple event definitions can have the same event type.

member.name: M:Sandbox.Common.ObjectBuilders.IMyRemapHelper.RemapEntityId(System.Int64)
member.summary: Returns a new entity ID for the entity with the given old entity ID. The function will return the same new entityId only if the saveMapping argument is set to true.

member.name: M:Sandbox.Common.ObjectBuilders.IMyRemapHelper.Clear
member.summary: Clears all the saved mappings from the remap helper and gets it ready for the next remapping operation.

member.summary: When ConnectedEntityId is not null, this tells whether the connection is only approach (yellow) or locked connection (green)

member.summary: This is character toolbar that allows building everything.

member.summary: THIS IS OBSOLETE

member.name: F:Sandbox.Common.ObjectBuilders.Definitions.MyObjectBuilder_BlueprintDefinition.BaseProductionTimeInSeconds
member.summary: Base production time in seconds, which is affected by speed increase of refinery or assembler.

member.name: P:Sandbox.Common.ObjectBuilders.MyObjectBuilder_ProductionBlock.Inventory
member.summary: Don't use. Backward compatibility only. Use InputInventory and OutputInventory instead.

member.name: M:Sandbox.Common.ObjectBuilders.MyObjectBuilderType.ParseBackwardsCompatible(System.String)
member.summary: Can handle old values as well.

member.name: F:Sandbox.Common.ObjectBuilders.Definitions.MyAutorotateMode.OneDirection
member.summary: When block has mount points only on one side, it will autorotate so that side is touching the surface. Otherwise, full range of rotations is allowed.

member.name: F:Sandbox.Common.ObjectBuilders.Definitions.MyAutorotateMode.OppositeDirections
member.summary: When block has mount points only on two sides and those sides are opposite each other (eg. Top and Bottom), it will autorotate so that one of these sides is touching the surface. Otherwise, full range of rotations is allowed.

member.name: F:Sandbox.Common.ObjectBuilders.Definitions.MyAutorotateMode.FirstDirection
member.summary: When block has mountpoint on at least one side, it will autorotate so that this side is touching the surface. Otherwise, full range of rotations is allowed.

member.name: P:Sandbox.Common.ObjectBuilders.MyObjectBuilder_InventoryItem.Content
member.summary: Obsolete. It is here only to keep backwards compatibility with old saves

member.name: F:Sandbox.Common.ObjectBuilders.MyObjectBuilder_Checkpoint.ElapsedGameTime
member.summary: This is long because TimeSpan is not serialized

member.name: P:Sandbox.Common.ObjectBuilders.MyObjectBuilder_Checkpoint.GameTime
member.summary: Obsolete. Use ElapsedGameTime

member.name: P:Sandbox.Common.ObjectBuilders.MyObjectBuilder_Checkpoint.HarvestMode
member.summary: This member is obsolete. Use GameType instead.

member.summary: Force type applied to physic object.

member.summary: This method is used when loading existing entity IDs to track the last generated ID

member.summary: Registers entity with given ID. Do not call this directly, it is called automatically when EntityID is first time assigned.

member.summary: Allocated new entity ID (won't add to list) Entity with this ID should be added immediatelly

member.name: M:Sandbox.Game.Entities.MyEntityIdentifier.SwapRegisteredEntityId(Sandbox.ModAPI.IMyEntity,System.Int64,System.Int64)
member.summary: Changes ID by which an entity is registered. Do not call this directly, it is called automatically when EntityID changes.

member.name: P:Sandbox.Game.Entities.MyEntityIdentifier.AllocationSuspended
member.summary: Freezes allocating entity ids. This is important, because during load, no entity cannot allocate new id, because it could allocate id which already has entity which will be loaded soon.
